name: donkulous DRIBBLE - more ridonkulous than some Cup in the World
name_original: donkulous DRIBBLE - more ridonkulous than some Cup in the World
description:
*** Play & Win DataMan Apps ***
We're suffering from Soccer Hangover! That's why we're giving away our DataMan apps, the smartest weapons against data overage, to you :)

• Score 30 pt & win DataMan Next ($1.99)
• Score 40 pt & win DataMan Pro ($4.99)
• Score 50 pt & win DataMan Enterprise ($9.99)

To claim your prize, just tweet your winning gameplay video.

There're only 100 copies of DataMan to giveaway. So Hurry ;)

Learn more about DataMan: http://xvision.me/dm

[ Game Description ]
Join the Cup! Train your team to be #1 in the World Rank. Warning: This is an unapologetically HARD task.

[ Howto Play ]
> Dribble past the defenders.
> Tap left/right of screen to change lane.

[ World Rank ]
Play and Drill your team repeatedly to improve its rank.

[ Cheat Tip ]
Tap with 2 or more fingers to jump lanes. Master this & see your score shoot up!

[ Dare Challenge ]
Tap DARE to challenge your Game Center frenz. Accept or forever live in Shame!

[ Share Replays ]
Showoff your skillz. Post your gameplay video on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube & Kamcord.
